dict.string: # Context-sensitive help lookup for MT tags. # For better recognition of "mt:Foo" tag names, add ":" to your # word character list in TextMate's "Text Editing" preferences. if grep <<<${TM_CURRENT_WORD:-!} -Esqi '^mt$' then echo "You may need to add ':' to the \"Word Characters\" list in TextMate's \"Text Editing\" preferences." exit fi if grep <<<${TM_CURRENT_WORD:-!} -Esq '[a-zA-Z0-9_]+' then exit_show_html "<meta http-equiv='Refresh' content='0;URL=http://www.movabletype.org/tag/$TM_CURRENT_WORD'>" else echo "Nothing to lookup (hint: place the caret on a tag name)" fi
